title: ToToM - Bootleg is Resistance Vol. III/III [FLAC] (around NIN)
description:
ToToM
Bootleg is Resistance, volume III
2008

This album is the third and last volume out of the Bootleg is Resistance trilogy, a triple mashup album made around songs by Nine Inch Nails from the album Year Zero, which are mixed up with completely stranger songs. This third volume features mashups (or bootlegs, whatever you call them) which were left over, but sometimes can fit just as well as mashups from the first two volumes, depending on your tastes.


01 . Hurt Power (Nine Inch Nails - Hurt vs. HYPERPOWER!) 1:39
02 . The Beginning of Feeling Loved (Depeche Mode - I Feel Loved & Lady sovereign - Love me or Hate me vs. The Beginning of the End) 3:04
03 . Young Survivors (Peter, Bjorn & John - Young Folks vs. Survivalism) 4:23
04 . Back to Capital G (Capital G vs. Amy Winehouse - Back to Black) 3:30
05 . Meet your Sweet Master Alabama (Meet your Master vs. Lynyrd Skynyrd - Sweet Home Alabama) 3:42
06 . Beginning to Be Alive, Born to End Dead (The Beginning of the End vs. Patrick Hernandez - Born to Be Alive) 3:09
07 . G Wants the Same Capital (Capital G vs. Scissor Sisters - Everybody Wants the Same Thing) 4:47
08 . Meet your Maniac (Meet your Master vs. Mike Sambello - Maniac) 3:37
09 . The Great Run (The Great Destroyer vs. Gnarls Barkley - Run) 2:20
10 . The Beginning of the Call (The Beginning of the End vs. Blondie - Call me) 4:40
11 . Run Capital Run (Capital G vs. Queens of the Stone Age - Run Pig Run) 4:40
12 . God Beetle (God Given vs. Blur - Beetlebum) 4:48
13 . Meet Your Superstition (Stevie Wonder - Superstition vs. Meet your Master) 4:31
14 . Who Wants to Destroy Forever (The Great Destroyer vs. Queen - Who Wants to Live Forever) 2:02
15 . In this Green World (In this Twilight vs. Gorillaz - O Green World) 3:31
16 . Cleaning out my Zero Sum (Zero Sum vs. Eminem - Cleaning out my Closet) 4:52


all songs originally written by Trent Reznor and the artists as mentioned.
every track produced by ToToM
artwork by Jbaal
